Jalin Moore 16 Yd Run (Chandler Staton Kick)

videos.description: Trace McSorley takes it himself from 12 yards out for a Penn State touchdown.
videos.headline: McSorley runs it in for a 12-yard TD

videos.description: Darrynton Evans takes the kickoff return 100 yards to the house for Appalachian State.
videos.headline: Appalachian State takes kickoff return 100 yards to the house

videos.description: Penn State's Trace McSorley slices through the defense for his second rushing touchdown.
videos.headline: McSorley scampers 10 yards for the score

videos.description: Ricky Slade stays on his feet and goes 27 yards for a Penn State touchdown.
videos.headline: Penn State's Slade runs for 27-yard TD

videos.description: Appalachian State quarterback Zac Thomas connects with wide receiver Malik Williams for a 17-yard touchdown to begin fourth quarter.
videos.headline: Mountaineers' QB drops dime to open 4th quarter

videos.description: Nittany Lions answer Mountaineers' 4th quarter score with a 46-yard reception by wide receiver KJ Hamler, setting up a Miles Sanders 2-yard rushing touchdown.
videos.headline: Penn State quickly responds with long completion and rush TD

videos.description: Mountaineers quarterback Zac Thomas completes an incredible sideline pass to wide receiver Corey Sutton for 39 yards. Thomas punches in a QB keeper to tie the game at 31.
videos.headline: Appalachian State knots score with Penn State late

videos.description: Appalachian State running back Jalin Moore scoots into the end zone for a 16-yard rushing touchdown to take a late lead.
videos.headline: App State stuns Penn State with late TD

videos.description: Penn State QB Trace McSorley throws a missile to wide receiver KJ Hamler for a 15-yard touchdown to tie the game at 38-38.
videos.headline: Penn State responds with clutch game-tying TD

videos.description: Appalachian State kicker Chandler Staton misses wide right on a go-ahead 56-yard field goal with 20 seconds remaining.
videos.headline: App State misses wide on go-ahead 56-yard FG

videos.description: Penn State running back Miles Sanders slides into the end zone for a 4-yard touchdown run.
videos.headline: Penn State strikes first in OT

videos.description: Penn State DB Zac Thomas picks off Appalachian State quarterback Zac Thomas in the end zone to fend off the Mountaineers in overtime.
videos.headline: Penn State survives with OT interception
